pageContext.claim: “Mike Pence didn't have the courage to do what should have been done to protect our Country and our Constitution, giving States a chance to certify a corrected set of facts, not the fraudulent or inaccurate ones which they were asked to previously certify. USA demands the truth!”
pageContext.analysis: Utterly false. The vice president has no such power, as Pence had repeatedly tried to make clear to Trump. No state requested that its certified vote counts be rejected.
